description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Neon Prime is a retro style vertical space shooter with the player fighting their way through waves of enemies and bosses, over five stages to defeat the Neon Prime. As well as the story mode players can play through the 5 story level and 5 extra levels. A Neon Prime has entered our solar system. We sent our main fleet to engage it but contact has been lost. Now you are our only hope.
description.short: Neon Prime is a retro style vertical space shooter with the player fighting their way through waves of enemies and bosses, over five stages to defeat the Neon Prime. As well as the story mode players can play through the 5 story level and 5 extra levels. A Neon Prime has entered our solar system. We sent our main fleet to engage it but contact has been lost. Now you are our only hope.
